alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 11:56PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MCMULLEN...SOUTHERN LIVE OAK AND SOUTHWESTERN BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Beeville to River Creek Acres to 11 miles southwest of Simmons. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... George West, Argenta, Lagarto, Mount Lucas, River Creek Acres, Dinero, Clegg, and Tynan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 40 and 63. US Highway 281 between mile markers 626 and 646. US Highway 59 between mile markers 704 and 742. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
